title: Inspection by Fire Departmental: For all high-rise and special buildings, the work shall also be subject to inspection by the Chief Fire Officer, and the Commissioner shall issue the occupancy certificate/accept building completion certificate only after clearance by the said Chief Fire Officer
clause_text: Inspection by Fire Departmental: For all high-rise and special buildings, the work shall also be subject to inspection by the Chief Fire Officer, and the Commissioner shall issue the occupancy certificate/accept building completion certificate only after clearance by the said Chief Fire Officer.
